nodes.text: This school was a teaching site on the Aing-Tii homeworld. It was here that the Aing-Tii Tadar'Ro taught Jorj Car'das about the culture of the Aing-Tii species. Later, after the Yuuzhan Vong War, Jedi Knight Jacen Solo traveled here and was taught several Force techniques—including flow-walking—from Tadar'Ro. In 43.5 ABY, Tadar'Ro taught Jedi Grand Master Luke Skywalker and his son, Ben Skywalker, teleportation and flow-walking techniques.
